summary: Frontend testing of 7 new features for Milkbites e-commerce platform. All features verified working via Playwright UI tests.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 7 new features tested and working. Logo displays in header, login page, and footer (with inverted colors). Hero slider works with navigation arrows and dot indicators. Guest cart stores items in localStorage and merges with user cart on login. Checkout date picker correctly disables past dates and blocked dates (Jan 13, 14, 2026).

header_logo.details: Logo image (qna9h32i_IMG-4835.PNG) displays in header instead of text. URL: https://customer-assets.emergentagent.com/job_cake-commerce-4/artifacts/qna9h32i_IMG-4835.PNG

guest_cart_localStorage.details: Items added to localStorage as guestCart for non-logged-in users. Format: {items: [{product_id, quantity, price, customization}]}

guest_cart_badge.details: Cart badge shows item count on cart icon for guest users. Badge appears with count after adding items.

guest_cart_merge_on_login.details: Guest cart items merge with user cart on login. localStorage guestCart is cleared after merge. Toast shows 'Your cart items have been saved!'

hero_image_slider.details: Hero slider displays multiple images (2 found). Navigation arrows (left/right) work. Dot indicators work. Auto-advance enabled (5 second interval).

checkout_delivery_date_picker.details: Calendar opens on click using react-day-picker. Past dates (today and before) are disabled. Blocked dates (2026-01-13, 2026-01-14) are disabled with text-gray-300 cursor-not-allowed styling. Selecting a date updates the field correctly.

checkout_pickup_date_picker.details: Pickup date picker works similarly to delivery date picker. Same blocked dates are disabled. Date selection works correctly.

footer_logo_inverted.details: Footer displays logo with inverted colors using CSS classes: brightness-0 invert

login_page_logo.details: Login page displays logo image above the sign-in form

screenshots: .screenshots/homepage_initial.png - Homepage with header logo and hero slider
.screenshots/test_guest_cart.png - Guest cart with badge showing count
.screenshots/after_login.png - After login with cart merge toast
.screenshots/hero_slider_final.png - Hero slider with different image after navigation
